title: The downside to "1 tricking"
body:
https://imgur.com/eZCYjIK

Not a one trick per say, but im only good a handful of champs.

Suggestions for easy "s" champs would be helpful before the reset.

replies.body: I haven't gotten a key shard in, like, 200 games.
U don't get them from games anymore, they're part of the honour system, which from what I've seen in your posts, doesn't seem like something you would be too high up in... =P

> [{quoted}](name=Monkey Max,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7XQc9YoO,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-10-31T05:15:47.363+0000)
>
> U don't get them from games anymore, they're part of the honour system, which from what I've seen in your posts, doesn't seem like something you would be too high up in... =P

Rank 0 and I just got 14 day banned.

Time for a new start so I can get keys again.
i get atleast 1 a week. Almost every time i log on i get the "key frag for being honorable" message.

once you get honour lvl5 you seem to get about 1 every 1-2 days. I'm not even sure how many key frags I have anymore.

:P

https://image.prntscr.com/image/scuQiRgERXa0_CZEbMJChg.png

Doing it the other way isn't any better though.

I have this super good at getting s friend who always get s.

When i need to get chest, I invite him to party, pick a random champ and get chest that way....

You think that's bad.

Here's what *I* think is bad (mind you, I'm biased):

https://imgur.com/5ZifiUo

I feel you, though.

mm not quite there yet my young padawan

https://i.snag.gy/0XQTS4.jpg

Yeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaa...
More champs doesn't exactly help....

https://i.gyazo.com/033b3bb8f6eaa094efe0c15a5b78cd16.png

Higher honour giving more key fragments is a blatant lie, I have more unopened chests now than when honour first came out, and still no keys.
